xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: {pre} #** * Service to get SavedExport list *# #set($class = "XWiki.SavedListClass") ## if the page parameter is available then we are updating a SavedExport list $response.setContentType("text/xml") #set($mpexport = $xwiki.collection) #if($request.page) #set($savedexport = $xwiki.getDocument($request.page)) <result> <name>$mpexport.escapeForXML($savedexport.getFullName())</name> <title>$mpexport.escapeForXML($savedexport.getDisplayTitle())</title> #set($ok = $savedexport.use($class)) #set($list = $util.split($savedexport.getValue("list"), "|")) #foreach($item in $list) #set($itemdoc = $xwiki.getDocument($item)) #set($itemtext = "${itemdoc.displayTitle} (${itemdoc.fullName})") <page info="$mpexport.escapeForXML($item)">$mpexport.escapeForXML($itemtext)</page> #end </result> #else <result></result> #end {/pre}
